attributes.action: Change the law so that convicted murderers may only be released from jail if the people they kill walk through the gates with them.
attributes.additional_details: There is no punishment for any crime in this country any more, except for those who are beheaded for the crime of being a non-Muslim or a member of the Armed Forces.  Anybody who kills somebody else should NEVER be released from prison.  Even better, re-introduce capital punishment for capital crime!
